name: Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas/Henderson

reviews.text: I felt like I was at home. They remembered my name. The room is perfect. I do a lot of work in my room in the evenings and it has everything I need - an amazing desk, comfortable chair and great internet service. The bed is great. I sleep as well as at home. If I need to go shopping, everything is close.
reviews.title: Great service and value

reviews.text: This was a business trip where we used the meeting facilities at the Hilton Garden Inn LV/Henderson. The staff was friendly and the meeting went off perfectly. The food served at lunch was good. The sleeping room was clean and well kept.
reviews.title: Terrific Meeting Room Space

reviews.text: This was our third time at this hotel and it gets better and better. The front desk manager Steve Bruce is as welcoming as a long lost father. The bottles of water and a cookie are an unexpected and nice touch. Dinner could not be easier, the chef, Milton will gladly come out of the open kitchen and pretty much make whatever you want (providing he has the ingredients!). The drinks are very reasonable, the service is friendly and unobtrusive yet they do not ignore you. We ate outside one night and it was wonderful. We love this hotel, it is a real gem in a sea of mediocre hotels in Las Vegas. BTW, it is about a ten minute drive from the strip and is so much better, free coffee in your room, newspaper in the morning, incredible staff, why would you stay anywhere else???
reviews.title: The best value in Las Vegas, home away from home feeling

reviews.text: I stayed at the HGI for business travel for a week. The accommodations were well maintained and I learned that the hotel was very recently built. I found the heavenly beds to be great, I had a very restful sleep. The bathrooms were clean and all the furniture in great shape. I found the hotel staff to be excellent as they were very knowledgeable, particularly Steve who checked me in. He was very friendly and provided me with various information I needed. I am very particular about cleanliness and comfort in my own home and I felt very happy here at the HGI. In my opinion, the hotel is a great value for what I paid and I will definitely be staying here again!
reviews.title: I'll be back!

reviews.text: Very friendly services. Enjoyed our stay, the rooms were really clean and very comfortable.
reviews.title: VERY PROFESSIONAL
Great Value and Friendly People
reviews.text: I have been staying with the HGI on a monthly basis for the past year. Their employees are fantastic, go above and beyond the call of duty. The location is great, there is good shopping, good restaurants, and good freeway access. Great value for the money....

Wonderful in EVERY way! The Manager was SO sweet to my little boys & everyone went out of their way to make sure we had a good time. Hotel was clean & new and the pool was great. Breakfast was delicious. Will definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Wonderful in EVERY way! The Manager was...

reviews.text: This hotel was beautiful, not only that the rooms were great as well. The entire staff made our stay fantastic. We needed some things mapquest and maryann was very happy to do so for us. She even came out to the pool and gave the kids popcisles. Now that something you just don't see. Keep up the good work. We will be back soon.
reviews.title: GREAT PLACE TO STAY /FRIENDLY STAFF

reviews.text: Perfect off the strip hotel to relax, and enjoy your time in Vegas. The staff was VERY friendly, facilities were perfect, and stay was phenomenal.
reviews.title: AMAZZZING

reviews.text: I travel with friends every year to Las Vegas, this year we had a friend who lives in Henderson and she didn't have enough room for all of us to stay so we decided to stay at a nearby hotel.
reviews.title: The best place to stay away from the Las Vegas Strip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I concur with all the wonderful accolades mentioned previously. A few personal notes:
reviews.title: Outstanding HGI property

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jordan, our shuttle driver/front desk clerk from Maui, was very pleasant, friendly, and helpful. Our first night was ruined by the couple next door who left the TV blasting while not even being in the room. When they returned at 1 am, he, retching down the hallway, continued to a profanity-laden argument with his partner in the room (at least the TV is off now) for the next half hour. Needless to say, between the TV and his drunken tirade, we got very little sleep. Lauren at the desk moved us to another room later that morning, apologizing for our restless night. The new room was a one-bedroom suite and was very quiet. I'm a Diamond member and wondered had the initial desk clerk at check-in upgraded us at check-in (hotel was not full) might we have avoided the first night fiasco with the drunken fool next door? Anyway, thank you Lauren for the great room the next day.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Service

reviews.text: I also wanted to compliment the tall chef for the wonderful breakfast ; he cooks a mean omelette! The servers were also very nice. Very spacious gym (for a HGI) with fair cardio equipment. Wished the room had a safe. Would definitely return next time.
reviews.title: Gave out Room key without verifying Identification

reviews.text: Well...this is Hilton...you can't really have a bad surprise about the quality.But at some hotels,especially the smaller ones, attitude is more personal and friendly.This is one of them. A small hotel, but has everything - outdoor swimming pool and jacuzzy, free internet in the rooms and in the business center,great breakfast,was only $7.Rooms are extremely clean and service is impecable.As to the staff, they were more than friendly and helpful and made us feel really welcome.As to me,they won me with the warm home made chocolate chip cookies at check in :)The hotel is located about 15-20 min drive from the strip in Las Vegas.There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel which for 20 min. takes you to the bus center where the buses for the strip start.There is a big casino hotel right next to this one.Definitely a very convenient place to stay.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: We stayed at this facility thru Triple Crown baseball. Our 5 year old rode back to the hotel with another family to watch TV. The father went to the front desk with our 5 year old and was able to get a room key. He did not show any ID and the hotel never called us to see if it was okay for him to have a key. If they would have checked his ID they would have realized the name was different than the room. The hotel backed up their decision because they said out 5 year old knew the name and room number. The hotel did not know this gentleman from adam and honestly this could have been any little girl. Our 5 year old got her swim suit and went swimming, which we were never asked or would have approved without one of her parents being present. The hotel stated they are trying to make our 5 year old happy. I guess they are not concerned with keeping paying parents happy. I would be very careful of this facility as well as the Hampton Inn and Holiday Inn in Henderson. The hotel offered to give us future stays to make up for it. Sorry, not really trusting any of the facilities since they give out room keys without checking identification. I am furious that the hotel feels it is okay to release a room key without identification to a man with a little girl. If I would have wanted our 5 year old to go swimming, I would have given her a key to the room. They clearly violated their corporate policy and continue to make excuses for their mistake by saying they were trying to keep the kids happy
reviews.title: Comfortable and clean
A VERY PLEASANT STAY CLOSE TO' THE HUSTLE AND BUSTLE OF LAS VEGAS
reviews.text: Big and comfortable room, clean hotel and very nice staff!
Stayed 2 days in room 302: we recommend it!
reviews.title: Great Hotel - Best Staff I have experienced

reviews.text: V&F from Italy
reviews.title: A great staff allowed us a great meeting!

reviews.text: Wonderful hotel - property is a normal Hilton Garden Inn - it is the staff with Danny and Steve and the waitresses Vicki at night and a couple in the morning that do there best to make you comfortable. I stayed there for a week before checking into Planet Hollywood for 5 days as my wife was coming for the weekend. At Planet Hollywood I had a three room suite on the 56th floor overlooking Las Vegas. However, it was not as good an experience as the customer service at the Hilton so I checked out and spent my last 5 days in Henderson.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Trip

reviews.text: Vicky the bartender was wonderful as was Danny at the front desk - the whole staff went out of their way to make our meeting good - Vicky even came in early to open the bar so we can close our meeting with a toast!
reviews.title: Great hotel, great price, great location

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas/Henderson Hotel Henderson
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas/Henderson is conveniently located off US-95/93 at Exit 64 and I-215. Just minutes away from the Las Vegas Strip, 10 miles from McCarran International Airport (LAS) and a short drive to Lake Mead National Recreation Area. Offering complimentary airport and area shuttle service. Enjoy on site dining, a fully stocked lounge and delicious room service. Host a meeting with over 2,025 s.f. of meeting space available.
